title: Berry Berry Milkshake

Description :
        Nozumu and a pair of older twins have been inseparable friends sincechildhood. Finally, they have the opportunity to attend the sameschool, but their time together will be limited to just one year.Anticipating the loneliness that will follow, Nozumu comes up with aproposal.+
